title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, the synchronization process does not complete successfully.
EB: The synchronization process should complete successfully when trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file). 3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files. The synchronization process should fail.
